item.title: Installing WordPress 2.9.2 on Windows Server 2003 using Microsoft's Web Platform Installer
item.description: Microsoft's Web Platform Installer has become a little better known, but how easy does it really make installations? In this article I use the Web Platform Installer to install WordPress (with MySQL, PHP, and etcetera) on Windows Server 2003.

item.title: Ubuntu Quickie: MySQL and PostgreSQL passwords
item.description: Quickie on changing the passwords for MySQL and PostgreSQL, after installing from the repos.

item.title: Ubuntu Quickie: Installing MySQL and PostgreSQL
item.description: Quickie on installing MySQL and PostgreSQL to Ubuntu 7.04.

item.title: The major failing of Akismet ...
item.description: What's the one major failing of Akismet? No information about what IPs were used to deliver that spam.

item.title: PHP Forum Software Showdown Part 6: phpBB
item.description: In this article, we'll be going over how to install phpBB 2.0.21. We'll also be looking at how phpBB stacks up to other PHP-based forum solutions.

item.title: PHP Forum Software Showdown Part 5: PunBB
item.description: In this article, we'll be going over how to install PunBB 1.2.14. We'll also be looking at how PunBB stacks up to other PHP-based forum solutions.

item.title: PHP Forum Software Showdown Part 4: MyBB
item.description: In this article, we'll be going over how to install MyBB 1.2.1. We'll also be looking at how MyBB stacks up to other PHP-based forum solutions.

item.title: PHP Forum Software Showdown Part 3: Simple Machines
item.description: In this article, we'll be going over how to install Simple Machines 1.0.9. We'll also be looking at how Simple Machines stacks up to other PHP-based forum solutions.

item.title: PHP Forum Software Showdown Part 2: Vanilla
item.description: In this article, we'll be going over how to install Vanilla 1.0.1. We'll also be looking at how Vanilla stacks up to other PHP-based forum solutions.

item.title: PHP Forum Software Showdown Part 1: bbPress
item.description: In this article, we'll be going over how to install bbPress 0.73. We'll also be looking at how bbPress stacks up to other PHP-based forum solutions.

item.title: Installing Apache 2.0.59 to a Windows-based computer, locally: Part 3
item.description: In part three of this multi-part guide, we'll be porting over from an Apache 1.3.x Web server to an Apache 2.0.x Web server by adding support for PHP 4.4.2 and PHP 5.1.4. We also go over how to setup MySQL and PostgreSQL for our new version of Apache. In the last guide of this series, we'll be going over how to create batch files to switch between all of the different possible servers we can now run.

item.title: Installing MySQL Query Browser 1.1.20 on a local Windows-based, Apache, server
item.description: In this guide, we'll be installing the MySQL Query Browser, version 1.1.20.

item.title: Upgrading phpMyAdmin (2.7.0-pl2 to 2.8.1) on a local, Windows-based, Apache server
item.description: In this guide, we'll be upgrading phpMyAdmin 2.7.0-pl2 to 2.8.1, on a Windows machine, running Apache 1.x.

item.title: WP-ShortStat SQL queries
item.description: SQL queries to update records from older versions of wp-shortstats.

item.title: Adding MySQL connectivity to ColdFusion MX on a local Windows-based, Apache, server
item.description: This time, we'll be setting up MySQL 4.1.18 and ColdFusion MX 6.1 on our local server. Because of some of the choices that we've made before, this installation is going to be fairly quick.
